law.catch_line: of motor vehicle retail price for sales on or after July 1, 2014.

section.section: The value of the purchased motor vehicle offered for registration and the value of the vehicle offered in trade shall be attested to in a notarized affidavit.

If a notarized affidavit is not available:
The retail price of the purchased motor vehicle offered for registration shall be determined as follows:
Ninety percent (90%) of the manufacturer's suggested retail price of the vehicle with all equipment and accessories, standard and optional, and transportation charges; or
Eighty-one percent (81%) of the manufacturer's suggested retail price of the vehicle with all equipment and accessories, standard and optional, and transportation charges in the case of new trucks of gross weight in excess of ten thousand (10,000) pounds; and
The value of the vehicle offered in trade shall be the trade-in value, as established by the reference manual.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 10, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 11, effective June 25, 2013.
